entry.title: York Peppermint Patties Changemakers - 175ct
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Bulk
Price: 39.99

A Whole Box of Minty Goodness

     A refreshing chocolate treat like no other, York Peppermint Patties are a delicious and beloved confection that has been around since the early 1940s. Taste the creamy mint filling enveloped by rich dark chocolate, a combo that has proven to be the perfect after coffee dessert for almost 75 years.

Add to Loot Bags or any themed Candy Buffet
